thread.section_title: Premier Dead Sea USA Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Premier Dead Sea USA | www.premierdeadsea-usa.com
thread.title: Heather
thread.title_full: Premier Dead Sea USA reviewed by Heather

author: Heather
title: Heather
text: The products offered at Premier Skincare are outstanding! They are luxurious and very effective. Chelsie in the customer service department is wonderful, she is very helpful and clearly her number one priority is making sure the consumer has a very positive experience. I highly recommend these products!
